metadata.dc:title: Neumonitis intersticial por virus herpes simple en un trasplante de medula ósea alogénico, tratada con éxito con aciclovir.
[Interstitial pneumonitis caused by herpes simplex virus in an allogeneic bone marrow transplant successfully treated with acyclovir].
